description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly inserts user-controlled data ('c' and 'd' variables) into the HTML content without proper sanitization or encoding. An attacker could potentially inject malicious scripts by manipulating 'data-youtube' and 'data-ytparams' attributes, leading to XSS attacks. This is related to CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting').
